description: Try our easy to follow Home-Style Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato
name: Home-Style Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat and cook the patties for about 5 minutes on each side or until browned and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, toast the hamburger buns, if desired, cut-side up, under a preheated grill until golden.
To serve, lay a cheese slice onto each bun base. Top with lettuce, tomato, a cooked pattie and a bun lid.
